Title: Inception
Synopsis: A professional thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 4
Synopsis: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

Title: Django Unchained
Synopsis: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

Title: X-Men: First Class
Synopsis: In 1962, during the height of the Cold War, Professor Charles Xavier gathers a team of mutants to prevent a global catastrophe.

Title: Tron: Legacy
Synopsis: Sam Flynn, the tech-savvy and daring son of Kevin Flynn, investigates his father's disappearance and finds himself pulled into the same digital world of fierce programs and gladiatorial games where his father has been living for 20 years.

Title: The Shining
Synopsis: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

Title: Star Wars: A New Hope
Lead Star Cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
Synopsis: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Title: Paranormal Activity
Synopsis: After moving into a suburban home, a young couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly presence.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Title: The Ring
Synopsis: A journalist investigates a cursed videotape that seemingly kills anyone who watches it within seven days.

Title: Frozen
Synopsis: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountaineer, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

Title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Synopsis: Harry Potter's third year at Hogwarts starts off with a warning from a psychic professor that something terrible is coming. Meanwhile, a dangerous wizard escapes from Azkaban prison.

Title: Looper
Synopsis: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent 30 years into the past, where a "looper" – a hired gun – awaits. One day, a looper recognizes his future self as his next target.

Title: Scream
Synopsis: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer who targets her and her friends by using horror film trivia as part of a deadly game.

Title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
Synopsis: The surviving Resistance faces the First Order once more as Rey's connection to the dark side deepens.

Title: Gravity
Synopsis: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

Title: Nobody
Synopsis: A seemingly ordinary man comes to the aid of a woman being harassed by thugs, which makes him the target of a vengeful drug lord.

Title: Bohemian Rhapsody
Synopsis: The story of the legendary rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid.

Title: Dumbo
Synopsis: A young circus elephant with oversized ears is ridiculed until he discovers that he can fly, helping to save the struggling circus.

Title: Venom
Synopsis: A journalist bonds with an alien symbiote that gives him superpowers but also a violent alter ego.

Title: Bambi
Director: David Hand (supervising director), various sequence directors
Synopsis: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest, learning about life, loss, and love.

Title: Wanted
Synopsis: A frustrated office worker discovers that he is the son of a professional assassin and joins a secret society of killers.

Title: Doctor Strange
Synopsis: A brilliant but arrogant surgeon learns mystical secrets and becomes a powerful sorcerer after a career-ending car crash.

Title: The Flash
Synopsis: Barry Allen uses his super-speed to change the past, but his attempt to save his family creates a world without super heroes, forcing him to race for his life in order to save the future.

Title: Joker
Synopsis: An origin story about the iconic villain from the Batman universe, exploring the descent of Arthur Fleck into madness.

Title: Logan
Synopsis: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X in a hideout on the Mexican border. But Logan's attempts to hide from the world and his legacy are upended when a young mutant arrives, pursued by dark forces.

Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
Synopsis: As Harry, Ron, and Hermione race to destroy the Horcruxes, Voldemort prepares for a final battle that will determine the fate of the wizarding world.

Title: The Old Guard
Synopsis: A covert team of immortal mercenaries is suddenly exposed and must fight to keep their identity a secret just as an unexpected new member is discovered.

Title: Cars 3
Synopsis: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he is still the best race car in the world.

Title: Ex Machina
Synopsis: A young programmer is selected to participate in a groundbreaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced A.I.

Title: The Avengers
Lead Star Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner
Synopsis: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop an alien invasion led by Loki.

Title: Saving Private Ryan
Synopsis: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers goes behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Title: Wall-E
Synopsis: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Title: Luca
Synopsis: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.

Title: Cars 2
Synopsis: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his best friend Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own.

Title: The Irishman
Synopsis: An old truck driver recalls his time as a hitman for the Bufalino crime family.

Title: The Fifth Element
Synopsis: In the 23rd century, a cab driver is thrust into a quest to save humanity when a mysterious woman falls into his cab.

Title: Wonder Woman
Synopsis: An Amazonian princess leaves her home to stop a world war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

Title: Ratatouille
Synopsis: A rat with a highly developed sense of taste dreams of becoming a chef in Paris and forms an unlikely alliance with a garbage boy in a famous restaurant.

Title: X-Men: Apocalypse
Lead Star Cast: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence
Synopsis: The ancient mutant Apocalypse awakens and gathers a team to cleanse humanity, forcing the X-Men to unite and stop him.

Title: American Psycho
Synopsis: A wealthy New York investment banker leads a double life as a serial killer.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 2
Synopsis: Retired hitman John Wick is forced back into the life when a former associate plots to seize control of a shadowy international assassins' guild.

Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Synopsis: With Spider-Man's identity revealed, Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange, but the spell goes wrong, bringing in villains from other universes.

Title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
Lead Star Cast: Daisy Ridley, Mark Hamill, Adam Driver
Synopsis: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares to battle the First Order.

Title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
Synopsis: Humanity finds a mysterious monolith buried beneath the lunar surface, which sets off a journey to Jupiter with the sentient computer HAL.

Title: Atomic Blonde
Synopsis: An MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to retrieve a dossier and unravel the mystery behind the death of a fellow agent.

Title: Iron Man
Synopsis: A billionaire industrialist and genius inventor is captured and builds a high-tech suit to escape, then uses it to fight against evil.

Title: The Blair Witch Project
Lead Star Cast: Heather Donahue, Michael C. Williams, Joshua Leonard
Synopsis: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary about a local legend, the Blair Witch.

Title: Zodiac
Lead Star Cast: Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, Robert Downey Jr.
Synopsis: A cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, a serial murderer who terrorized the San Francisco Bay Area in the late 1960s and early 1970s.

Title: Annabelle
Synopsis: A couple experiences terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanists.

Title: Cars 2
Director: John Lasseter, Lee Unkrich, Ash Brannon
Synopsis: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz Lightyear and his friends embark on a rescue mission to bring him home.

Title: Frozen II
Synopsis: Elsa, Anna, Kristoff, Olaf, and Sven set out on a journey to an enchanted forest to discover the origin of Elsa's powers.

Title: Glass Onion
Synopsis: Detective Benoit Blanc travels to Greece to peel back the layers of a mystery involving a new cast of colorful suspects.

Title: Brave
Synopsis: Determined to carve her own path in life, Princess Merida defies an age-old custom that inadvertently unleashes chaos into the kingdom.

Title: The Cabin in the Woods
Synopsis: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin, where they become victims of terrifying experiments.

Title: The Fly
Synopsis: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant fly after a botched teleportation experiment.

Title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Synopsis: Harry and his friends investigate a dark force that is petrifying students at Hogwarts.

Title: Moon
Synopsis: An astronaut mining helium-3 on the far side of the Moon begins to experience a personal crisis as his contract nears its end.

Title: The Sixth Sense
Synopsis: A child psychologist tries to help a disturbed boy who can see dead people.

Title: The King's Man
Synopsis: As a collection of history's worst tyrants and criminal masterminds gather to plot a war to wipe out millions, one man must race against time to stop them.

Title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
Synopsis: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return home.

Title: The Conjuring
Synopsis: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

Title: Dune
Synopsis: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Synopsis: Harry Potter learns on his eleventh birthday that he is a wizard and goes to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Title: Edge of Tomorrow
Synopsis: A soldier fighting aliens finds himself caught in a time loop, forcing him to relive the same brutal combat over and over.

Title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Synopsis: Harry finds himself mysteriously selected to compete in a dangerous wizarding tournament.

Title: No Country for Old Men
Lead Star Cast: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin
Synopsis: A hunter finds a pickup truck surrounded by dead men, a load of heroin, and two million dollars in cash, setting off a chain of violence.

Title: Speed Racer
Synopsis: A young driver aims to win the World Racing League championships with the help of his family and friends.

Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
Synopsis: Harry, Ron, and Hermione set out to find and destroy the secret to Voldemort's immortality and destructive power.

Title: Marriage Story
Synopsis: A stage director and his actor wife struggle through a grueling, coast-to-coast divorce that pushes them to their personal and creative extremes.

Title: Blade Runner 2049
Synopsis: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos.

Title: The Incredibles 2
Synopsis: Helen is chosen to lead a campaign to bring supers back, while Bob is left to care for their children, facing the challenges of everyday heroics.

Title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
Synopsis: When their headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, the Kingsman's journey leads them to the discovery of an allied spy organization in the US called Statesman, and these two elite secret organizations must band together to defeat a ruthless common enemy, in order to save the world.

Title: Big Hero 6
Synopsis: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who form a band of high-tech heroes to avenge a conspiracy.

Title: Heat
Synopsis: A professional thief begins to feel the heat from police when he leaves a clue at his latest heist.

Title: Up
Synopsis: Seventy-eight year old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

Title: The Exorcist
Lead Star Cast: Ellen Burstyn, Max von Sydow, Linda Blair
Synopsis: A 12-year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious demonic entity, forcing her mother to seek the help of two priests to save her.

Title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
Synopsis: A princess takes refuge with seven dwarfs in their cottage to escape her evil stepmother.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 3 ‚Äì Parabellum
Synopsis: Super-assassin John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the High Table, with a $14 million price tag on his head and an army of bounty-hunting killers on his trail.

Title: I Am Legend
Synopsis: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

Title: The Martian
Synopsis: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team presumes him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

Title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
Synopsis: A young adventurer joins an expedition to find the lost continent of Atlantis.

Title: Aquaman
Synopsis: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.

Title: Sherlock Holmes
Synopsis: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner John Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a foe whose plot is a threat to all of England.

Title: The Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
Lead Star Cast: Ryan Reynolds, Samuel L. Jackson, Salma Hayek
Synopsis: Bodyguard Michael Bryce continues his friendship with assassin Darius Kincaid as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

Title: Pacific Rim
Synopsis: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save humanity.

Title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
Synopsis: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Criminal Court.

Title: Gone Girl
Synopsis: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne reports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing.

Title: A Bug's Life
Synopsis: A misfit ant, looking for "tough warriors" to defend his colony from ravenous grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs who turn out to be circus performers.

Title: Toy Story
Synopsis: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

Title: Extraction
Synopsis: Tyler Rake, a black-market mercenary, embarks on a dangerous mission when he's hired to rescue the kidnapped son of a Mumbai crime lord.

Title: The Terminator
Synopsis: A cyborg is sent from a future apocalyptic timeline to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against machines, while a soldier from the same future is sent to protect her.

Title: Fight Club
Synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

Title: The Departed
Lead Star Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson
Synopsis: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Title: Titanic
Synopsis: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: Hancock
Synopsis: A hard-living superhero who has fallen out of public favor starts to turn things around thanks to the help of a PR expert.

Title: Schindler's List
Synopsis: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: Wreck-It Ralph
Synopsis: A video game villain dreams of becoming a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the entire arcade where he lives.

Title: Halloween
Synopsis: Forty years after the events of the original, Laurie Strode comes face to face one last time with masked killer Michael Myers.

Title: Zombieland
Lead Star Cast: Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Emma Stone, Abigail Breslin
Synopsis: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting tough guy searching for the last Twinkie, and a pair of sisters trying to get to an amusement park join forces to travel across a zombie-filled America.

Title: The Godfather
Synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Title: The Greatest Showman
Synopsis: Celebrates the birth of show business and tells of a visionary who rose from nothing to create a spectacle that became a worldwide sensation.

Title: Interstellar
Synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Title: Treasure Planet
Synopsis: A futuristic take on the classic tale where a rebellious teen discovers a treasure map and sets off on an intergalactic adventure.

Title: Jaws
Synopsis: A police chief, a marine scientist, and a professional shark hunter set out to hunt a great white shark that is terrorizing a summer resort town.

Title: The Nun
Synopsis: A priest with a haunted past and a novitiate on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the suicide of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force.

Title: Independence Day
Synopsis: The Earth is attacked by a technologically superior alien race, and a diverse group of people must band together to save humanity.

Title: Angels & Demons
Synopsis: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is called to investigate a mysterious symbol seared into the chest of a murdered physicist, leading to a conspiracy within the Vatican.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Lead Star Cast: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen
Synopsis: A young hobbit and his companions set out on a perilous journey to destroy an ancient and powerful ring and prevent it from falling into the hands of the Dark Lord.

Title: Whiplash
Synopsis: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

Title: Monsters, Inc.
Director: Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich
Synopsis: In Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley and his assistant Mike Wazowski work at Monsters, Inc., the city's power plant fueled by the screams of human children.

Title: Gladiator
Synopsis: A former Roman General seeks vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Title: Blade Runner
Synopsis: In a dystopian future, a blade runner is tasked with hunting down rogue replicants who have escaped to Earth.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Lead Star Cast: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen
Synopsis: The divided fellowship continues their quest to destroy the One Ring while making new allies and facing new dangers.

Title: Sleeping Beauty
Director: Clyde Geronimi, Les Clark, Eric Larson, Wolfgang Reitherman
Synopsis: A princess is cursed by an evil fairy to prick her finger on a spinning wheel and fall into a deep sleep, only to be awakened by true love's kiss.

Title: The Da Vinci Code
Synopsis: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon investigates a murder in the Louvre and discovers evidence of an ancient mystery.

Title: Braveheart
Synopsis: In 13th century Scotland, a commoner leads a rebellion against the tyrannical King Edward I of England.

Title: Rocketman
Synopsis: A musical fantasy about the human story of Elton John's breakthrough years.

Title: The Road
Synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, a father and son struggle to survive as they journey to the coast.
